author: cziegeler
msg: Minor tweaks to the build system

author: cziegeler
msg: The authentication framework now uses a configurable component to try to authenticate a user.
This allows to drop in own authentication services or e.g. the servlet authentication mechanism.

author: joerg
msg: alphabetical sorting makes it a bit easier
taglib block is marked unstable in the gump descriptor, so moving it to the unstable blocks here too
